name: Unit Economy Map
description:
Present coffee to the creator ☕️


Statistically, about 75% of startups that were able to attract investment fail to pay it back and close within the first three years. According to a study by the analytical company CB Insights, most failures occur because the market does not need the product.


The second most common reason is that the company runs out of money.


In order not to fail and start making money, startup owners need at least to be able to analyze their users, their product, and their economic performance.
